name: BaroqueFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Baroque Facts”
”Alexa, ask Baroque Facts to tell me a random fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baroque facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn the most fascinating facts about the Baroque era. You will learn about the art and the music that helped make this era history.

If you would like to go further in the skill, you can purchase the Art or Music pack to hear more facts. You would then be able to ask for a specific category in art or music, based on what you have purchased. 

The Art Pack will give you facts about art history from the Baroque era, like Bernini, Rembrandt, and Caravaggio.

The Music Pack will give you facts about music history from the Baroque era, like Vivaldi, Handel, and Bach.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
